summary: Successfully completed comprehensive testing of Survey360 Help Center redesign. The new two-column layout is fully functional with all required features implemented: Categories sidebar with 8 expandable categories, Quick Links section with 3 cards, content sections for Getting Started/Surveys/Sharing & Distribution/Responses, full-width search bar, article navigation with URL parameters, mobile responsive design, and theme consistency.
passed_tests: Help Center page loads correctly at /solutions/survey360/help
Header displays 'Help Center' title and 'Find answers, tutorials, and documentation for Survey360' subtitle
Full-width search bar (1104px) is visible and functional
Categories panel shows on left side with all 8 categories: Getting Started, Surveys, Sharing & Distribution, Responses, Analytics & Reports, Team & Collaboration, Account & Settings, Billing & Plans
Categories are expandable - clicking reveals nested articles and content
Quick Links section displays 3 card links: Getting Started Guide, Offline Mode Guide, Security Options
Content sections display properly for Getting Started, Surveys, Sharing & Distribution, and Responses
Clicking articles navigates to article view with URL parameter changes (e.g. ?tab=article&category=getting-started&article=welcome)
Two-column layout structure: Categories sidebar + Main content area
Search functionality works - typing filters/shows relevant content for terms like 'survey', 'analytics', 'responses', 'settings'
Quick Links are clickable and functional
Mobile responsive design - categories and menu visible on 390x844 viewport
Theme consistency maintained - Help Center respects light/dark mode settings (tested with light theme background: rgb(255, 255, 255))
Article content loads properly with detailed information (Welcome to Survey360 article shows full content with sections like 'What You Can Do', 'Create Beautiful Surveys', etc.)
Navigation breadcrumb trail visible when in article view
context_for_next_testing_agent: Help Center redesign is fully complete and functional. The NewHomeView component in Survey360HelpCenter.jsx successfully implements the two-column layout with expandable categories, Quick Links cards, content sections, and proper article navigation. All features from the review request are working correctly.

help_center_implementation_details.layout: Two-column: Categories sidebar (left) + Main content area (right)
help_center_implementation_details.content_sections: 4/4 displayed (Getting Started, Surveys, Sharing & Distribution, Responses)
